Package dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.blockchain.minichain

Class MiniBlockChain

java.lang.Object
dqm.jku.dqmeerkat.blockchain.minichain.MiniBlockChain
public class MiniBlockChain
extends java.lang.Object
Blockchain implementation for creating blockchains with a set of minichains.

      public void setId​(java.lang.String id)

      id - the id to set

    • getMinichains

      public java.util.SortedSet<MiniChain> getMinichains()
      Gets the minichains stored in the chain
      Returns:
      the minichains

    • setMinichains

      public void setMinichains​(java.util.SortedSet<MiniChain> minichains)
      Sets the minichains (security threat but needed for rdfbeans)
      Parameters:
      minichains - the minichains to set

    • getMiniChain

      public MiniChain getMiniChain​(java.lang.String chainId)
      Gets the minichain by its id
      Parameters:
      chainId - the id of the stored block
      Returns:
      the minichain if found, null otherwise

    • accessElementOfMiniChain

      public Block accessElementOfMiniChain​(java.lang.String chainId, int index)
      Accesses the element of a minichain by its blockId and index in the minichain
      Parameters:
      chainId - the id of the minichain
      index - the index of the block
      Returns:
      block if found, null otherwise

    • areChainsValid

      public boolean areChainsValid()
      Check if the chain is valid
      Returns:
      true if every minichain is valid, false if at least one is invalid

    • isSpecificChainValid

      public boolean isSpecificChainValid​(java.lang.String chainId)
      Checks if a specific minichain is valid
      Parameters:
      chainId - the id of the minichain
      Returns:
      true if valid, false if not found or not valid

    • addBlock

      public boolean addBlock​(Block block, java.lang.String uri)
      Adds a block to the minichain network. The block is added to an existing minichain or a new one is created
      Parameters:
      block - the block to be set
      uri - the uri of the minichain
      Returns:
      true if added, false otherwise

    • addDSDElement

      public boolean addDSDElement​(DSDElement e)
      Shortcut for adding a DSDElement to the existing minichain network. Works internally with addBlock
      Parameters:
      e - the DSDElement to be added
      Returns:
      true if added, false otherwise

    • findPreviousHash

      public java.lang.String findPreviousHash​(DSDElement e)
      Finds the previousHash of the minichain via a dsd element
      Parameters:
      e - the dsdelement to be checked
      Returns:
      previousHash if found, "0" if not (genesis block)

    • deleteChain

      public void deleteChain​(java.lang.String chainId)
      Flags a specific minichain as deleted, does nothing if no minichain is found
      Parameters:
      chainId - the id of the minichain

    • mergeChain

      public void mergeChain​(java.lang.String chainId)
      Flags a specific minichain as merged, does nothing if no minichain is found
      Parameters:
      chainId - the id of the minichain
